input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Technician I

Location: Greeley, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Title: Maintenance Technician I

Job Location: Greeley, CO

Job Salary: $27 - $30/hour (based on experience)

Requirements: 

 2+ years Industrial equipment repair / systems experience (Industrial environment or military) 2+ years Troubleshooting experience Strong level of equipment knowledge (i.e. electrical, mechanical, pneumatic, hydraulic systems, machinery, pipe systems, etc.) Advanced leadership, communication and analytical skills Ability to work 2nd shift (Monday - Friday: 2pm - 10:30pm)

Top Reasons to Work with Us

We are one of the world's leading, publicly held and traded facilities services providers who focus on highly specialized services to businesses of all types across North America. We design, manufacture and implement corporate identity uniform programs, first aid, safety, fire protection products and services, and the list goes on! As an established leader in the industry rooted in our culture and employee identity, we continue to grow at a rapid pace and are seeking Maintenance Technicians to support our facilities across the country! If you are looking to leverage your troubleshooting skills, get-hands on with Industrial machinery and add value to a great team of techs + operations with room for growth and promotion, this position is for you!

What You Will Be Doing

As The Maintenance Technician, You Will:

 Troubleshoot functionality and improve reliability of all production and facility equipment (including mechanical, electrical, pneumatic and hydraulic systems) Repair, maintain and grow your skillset of experience with components and machinery including but not limited to washers, dryers, steam tunnels, conveyor systems, boilers, etc. Perform and execute preventative maintenance, implement safety procedures and manage / monitor inventory supplies and records

What You Need for this Position

Requirements: 

 3+ years Industrial equipment repair / systems experience (Industrial environment or military) 3+ years Troubleshooting experience Strong level of equipment knowledge (i.e. electrical, mechanical, pneumatic, hydraulic systems, machinery, pipe systems, etc.) Advanced leadership, communication and analytical skills Ability to work 2nd shift (Monday - Friday: 2pm - 10:30pm)

What's In It For You

Salary Range: $27 - $30/hour (based on experience)

 Generous PTO Paid holidays Full Comprehensive Health Care Benefits (Medical, Dental and Vision) 401k Matching Profit Sharing Employee Stock Ownership Program Career Advancement and Promotion Opportunity Opportunity to join a family-style culture with a tremendous opportunity for growth!

So, if you are looking for an opportunity to put your troubleshooting skills to the test with a company that is invested in your personal and professional growth, APPLY TODAY!

Benefits

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Email Your Resume In Word To:

Noah.Haxton@CyberCoders.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JH16-1796220 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Noah Haxton - Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CyberCoders will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CyberCoders is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
